sentence.Network_cn: 她不拘礼节，让人耳目一新。

sentence.Network_en: She has a refreshingly healthy attitude to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对工作持一种明智态度，令人耳目一新。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... refreshing 提神的 refreshingly 清爽地 refreshment room 饮食店.
Skin is left refreshingly clean with no pore - clogging residue ., 皮肤留下清爽干净 , 没有孔隙堵塞残留.
in my tests , I found this design refreshingly easy to use .在测试中，我发现这项设计用起来格外地简便。

list.abs: Indeed , Dr Kochi himself has been refreshingly frank the WHO ' s poor record in the disease ., 事实上 , 高池博士自己一直相当坦率地承认世卫组织在抗击疾病方面记录不佳.
graphics refreshingly colourful and above all , fun , permitting the player to experience a whole new style of a battleship war game .游戏图象色彩丰富，当然首先就是非常有趣，让玩家体验到一种全新的战舰游戏类型。
Discover a refreshingly addictive puzzle game packed with up to 100 levels !, 发现一个清新上瘾益智游戏挤满了多达 100 个的水平!
refreshingly brazilian , a bit more exciting ., 清爽巴西口味 , 让人更加兴奋.

entry.tran: 使人耳目一新的；新鲜的
entry.def: You say that something is refreshing when it is pleasantly different from what you are used to.

example.ex: It's refreshing to hear somebody speaking common sense...
example.tran: 听到有人说话通情达理真是令人耳目一新。

example.ex: It made a refreshing change to see a good old-fashioned movie.
example.tran: 换换口味，看一部经典的老式电影会让人觉得耳目一新。

entry.tran: （沐浴或饮料）使人精神焕发的，提神的，清凉的
entry.def: A refreshing bath or drink makes you feel energetic or cool again after you have been tired or hot.

example.ex: Herbs have been used for centuries to make refreshing drinks.
example.tran: 草药用于调制提神饮品已有好几个世纪了。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner that relieves fatigue and restores vitality;

auth_sentence.content: Refreshingly he has always told it like it is.
auth_sentence.res_content: Refreshingly he has always told it like it is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Refreshingly he has always told it like it is.

auth_sentence.content: It is an audacious concept, but refreshingly it works.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is an audacious concept, but refreshingly it works.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is an audacious concept, but refreshingly it works.

auth_sentence.content: But his focus on the Western classics was refreshingly relentless.
auth_sentence.res_content: But his focus on the Western classics was refreshingly relentless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But his focus on the Western classics was refreshingly relentless.
